paper_abstract: The Seventh AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence and Interactive Digital Entertainment was held from October 11 to 14, 2011, on the campus of Stanford University near Palo Alto, California. The conference featured a research track, an industry track, a demo program, and three workshops. This report summarizes the conference and related activities.
paper_title: Recap of the Seventh AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence and Interactive Digital Entertainment (AIIDE)
